Articles.Content:
System.TypeLoadException: Could not load type 'IPartCostModifier' from assembly 'Assembly-CSharp, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null'.

You're using an outdated version of KSP... Switch to 0.24.1 or higher.

Also, will say here once:

Delete any previous NRAP installation before installing this one. That means delete any Kotysoft folder in the GameData, there should only be one named NRAP.

Hey SC,

That .zip file has a defunct and empty "kotysoft" dir structure in it...
Sweet mod. Will be very helpful, installing now.

Alright, very small update, no big bugfixes here, just some small tweaks for a better general experience, and also an upload to KerbalStuff

Changelog:

August 3rd 2014
v1.5.0.1
-Very slight optimizatrion of ressizing code
-CompatibilityChecker now checks for KSP 0.24.1 or later
-Removed empty Kotysoft folder

KerbalStuff upload is pending, hold on a little

EDIT: it's there!

Cheers!

Edited August 3, 2014 by stupid_chris
KerbalStuff link up

Looks Great, works great....

Thanks for this and all other mods...
an inline part would be very helpful as well

Is there any way to adjust an NRAP to make it radially attachable? Or to lower the minimum length/diameter still further? They're absolutely perfect for use as gravity assisted seismic probes...

Edited September 10, 2014 by Wanderfound
I need to report that 0.25.0 is saying that NRAP is incompatible.

I need to report that 0.25.0 is saying that NRAP is incompatible.

You don't need to report, I programmed that warning in. It's not KSP reporting that, it's NRAP itself.

You don't need to report, I programmed that warning in. It's not KSP reporting that, it's NRAP itself.

As I take it, you won'be able to update it for a while. Is something can be done to kill that nagging message at the startup? It works without any problems.

Go get a cup of coffee while program is loading...

LoL...
Does this mod still work for 0.25 ?
Yes, works without any issues here
It works but KSP complains that it's old every time you start the game.
I love this useful mod so I'm hoping it gets updated for 0.25 to lose the message on startup.
I'll add to the hope for a clean start up with no "OMG It's SOOO OOOOOLD" KSP on start up!

I love this useful mod so I'm hoping it gets updated for 0.25 to lose the message on startup.

With 0.90 at the door, no.

This said, I remember someone had sent me an inline model to use with NRAP, unfortunately, my inbox was wiped and I can't find my copy on my disk, so whoever that was, if you see this and still have it, I do still want it

With 0.90 at the door, no.

This said, I remember someone had sent me an inline model to use with NRAP, unfortunately, my inbox was wiped and I can't find my copy on my disk, so whoever that was, if you see this and still have it, I do still want it

Glad to hear I'm not the only one looking for an inline version as well. I hope you can incorporate it soon. Many thanks for this mod as it should streamline my design of standard lifting vehicles.

Does not work at 0.90 at all - there is no menu option in the VAB\SPH.

Interesting enough, it does not complain about incompatible version on 0.90.
Because if you looked at your logs you'd notice it doesn't load.

Because if you looked at your logs you'd notice it doesn't load.

No need to be so hostile, alright? I've just reported that NRAP isn't working on 0.90! It worked on 0.25 without any updates, so anyone can assume that it would work on 0.90. No need to go "you're idiot" on me, even if it's an intended behavior of NRAP with your little tinkering like version checkers and such (which I despise, BTW).

No need to be so hostile, alright? I've just reported that NRAP isn't working on 0.90! It worked on 0.25 without any updates, so anyone can assume that it would work on 0.90. No need to go "you're idiot" on me, even if it's an intended behavior of NRAP with your little tinkering like version checkers and such (which I despise, BTW).

Funny thing is, that wasn't even hostile. But thank you for telling me how much you despise my work. I was just pointing out that I literally can't help you without a log. Which I've been repeating since forever. This isn't even the version checker, NRAP is not ever locked down by it.

But yeah, update's out.

Changelog:

December 19th 2014
v1.5.0.2
-Recompiled for KSP 0.90
-Filter by Module tab Test Weight icon modified

No changes, really except for a recompiling and an update to CompatibilityChecker v4.

But yeah, update's out.

Changelog:

December 19th 2014
v1.5.0.2
-Recompiled for KSP 0.90
-Filter by Module tab Test Weight icon modified

No changes, really except for a recompiling and an update to CompatibilityChecker v4.

Thanks for keeping up this mod Chris Its a must have for me. You rock.

Hello,

Thank you stupid_chris for keeping this MOD updated, your hard work is appreciated.
Hello. Can anyone give me a link on 0.25 version of this plugin ?
